{"id":1218765893,"question_id":3374,"lang":"java","lang_name":"Java","time":"2 months, 2 weeks","timestamp":1711853609,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"3 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1218765893/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Count Alternating Subarrays","memory":"56.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public long countAlternatingSubarrays(int[] nums) {\n        \n        int len = nums.length;\n        long res= 0 ;\n        \n        int ed =0;\n        \n        for(int st= 0; st<len; st++){\n            \n            while(ed<len && (st==ed || nums[ed]!= nums[ed-1])){\n              \n                res += ed-st+1;\n                \n                ed++;\n                \n                // System.out.println(st + \" \" + ed + \" res=\"+res);\n            }\n            \n            st=ed-1;\n        }\n        \n        return res;\n        \n    }\n    // [1 0 1]1\n    // st    ed\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"count-alternating-subarrays","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
